for complying with any new or revised financial accounting
standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange
Act. ◻

CITIGROUP INC. Current Report on Form 8-K Item 2.02 Results of
Operations and Financial Condition. On October 13, 2020,
Citigroup Inc. held a conference call to discuss its results for
the quarter ended September 30, 2020. Copies of the transcript
of the conference call and related investor presentation are
being furnished as Exhibits 99.1 and 99.2 to this Form 8-K and
shall not be deemed to be “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of
the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, or otherwise
subject to the liabilities of that section. Item 9.01 Financial
Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits.
